content: Hello, I'm reaching out about the current status of my divorce case. Can you please provide me with an update on the report that was submitted last week?
I've checked our system and it appears that we received a report on Friday, but I couldn't find any information about a specific report from last week.
That's not what I heard. Can you check the court records again? I need to know if the judge has made a decision on the custody arrangement.
I've looked into the court records and it seems that there is some confusion about the custody arrangement. However, I couldn't find any specific information about the report you mentioned earlier.

This is really frustrating. Can you please provide me with a copy of the report so I can review it and understand what's going on? And also, can you confirm that the judge has made a decision on the case in general?

I apologize for the confusion, but I couldn't find any information about a specific report being sent to us. However, I did find that the court has scheduled a hearing for next week to discuss the custody arrangement.
